title: NOAM CHOMSKY // INTERVIEW // THE LAB TV
description:
Noam Chomsky shares his thoughts with Think Lab Editor Sasha Grujicic on everything from climate change to the US deficit. 

Interview by Sasha Grujicic
Video by Jake Chessum
Edited by Wasef El-Kharouf
Original Music by Darian Zahedi

For more from The Lab TV visit http://tv.thelabmagazine.com
For more from The Lab Magazine visit http://thelabmagazine.com
